oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Mamie Louise Hopper (Harper) and family, 1940s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Black and white photograph of two women, two girls, and one boy. Identified left to right as: Sandra Harper, Jo Ann Allen, Lizzie Summerhour, Mamie Louise Harper, Tommy Summerhour. Mamie Louise wears a hat. Jo Ann Allen was one of the Clinton 12. Photograph taken on a family visit to Los Angeles, CA.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Harper, Sandra; Allen, Jo Ann; Summerhour, Lizzie; Hopper (Harper), Mamie Louise; Summerhour, Tommy
Portrait photographs; Group portraits; African Americans; African Americans--Family relationships; African Americans--California--Los Angeles; African Americans--Women; African American families
Los Angeles (Calif.)
